snippet: Politics intrudes after the death of Richard Nelson Frye, 94, a noted Harvard scholar who loved a land and its culture.
abstract: Richard Nelson Frye, renowned American scholar of Iran who died in March in Boston at age 94, wanted to be buried on bank of idyllic Zayandeh River in Iran, but his plan has run up against Tehran's small but influential faction of hard-liners.
lead_paragraph: Politics intrudes after the death of Richard Nelson Frye, 94, a noted Harvard scholar who loved a land and its culture.

headline.main: American’s Wish for Iranian Burial Riles Hard-Liners
headline.print_headline: American’s Wish for Iranian Burial Riles Hard-Liners
